articles.description: Secondary a primary concern for both Las Vegas, Denver in AFC West clash
articles.content: Josh McDaniels knows what awaits his offense this Sunday. Unprompted in his opening statement during his Wednesday press conference, in fact the Las Vegas Raiders head coach spoke highly of the incom… [+5077 chars]
